system.description:
Your connection to the elements and inherent magical power contribute to both your strong sense of self and some impressive supernatural power. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You may change your elementalist spellcasting ability to Charisma if you desire. Once made, this choice is permanent.
  • You can use your sorcerer @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.h2tobazibq72ybdo]{Manifestations} with your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uit7l3mc64l5h8h1]{Elemental Blast}, provided they use a common damage type.
  • You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.tn41akceteoog5c2]{Elemental Manipulation} cantrip if you do not already know it or another sorcerer cantrip of your choice if you do.
  • You gain an expertise die on saves against effects that would impose the stunned, petrified, or paralyzed conditions on you.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in elementalist, 3 levels in sorcerer
